entry.title: Maono Desktop USB Microphone Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caseco
Type: Microphone
Price: 79.00

USB Microphone Kit
  • Acrylic mirror mute key, and the built-in LED Indicator lights to tell you the working status 
  •  Built-in professional sound chip-set and 16mm electret condenser transducer.
  • Well-suited to podcasting, game streaming, Skype calls, vocals and instruments, cardioid mode captures sound sources that are directly in front of the microphone.
  • Pop filter and windscreen cap can lower wind and Saliva interference, record voice more clear. 
  • The USB microphone kit includes 1x condenser microphone, 1x Table stand, 1x Shock mount, 1x Pop filter, 1x USB cable, 1x Wind foam
  • Compatible with Windows and Mac OS
  • The microphone has a USB data port, easy to connect with computers. No need extra driver software, and no need for an external sound card

entry.title: Bluetooth Portable Karaoke Mic Speaker
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caseco
Type: Microphone
Price: 16.99

  • The excellent design of karaoke wireless microphone made with aluminum alloy 
  • The Bluetooth Microphone Machine provides a more stable connection (up to 33 feet), faster pairing (takes only 2 seconds).
  • Compatible with Phone, Pad, PC, etc., Play from karaoke speaker and headset via Bluetooth, TF card, cable connection.
  • This Karaoke Microphone Speaker with VOLUME and REMIX sliding button itself has a louder and more sensitive output.
  • Built-in two high-quality inner-magnet loudspeakers and a 3-layer mesh filter reduce noise propagation. Can connect headphones and audio equipment.
  • This karaoke microphone with magic voice changer, there are 4 sound modes with this microphone: Original sound, child voice, male voice, and tough voice. 
  • The battery in the microphone is rechargeable lithium-ion 18650. Portable Bluetooth karaoke mic gets 4-6 hour’s playtime from a single charge.

entry.title: USB 2.0 Desktop Microphone
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caseco
Type: Microphone
Price: 22.99

USB Microphone Used for pc
  • Omnidirectional
  • Zinc alloy process
  • With indicator light
  • With One button Mute function
  • With Volume control function
  • Built-in Microphone, USB2.0
  • Supports windows 2000.xp/7/8/9/10/Vista,OS and so on
